name: Story of You: The Allied Kingdoms
name_original: Story of You: The Allied Kingdoms
description: Story of You: The Allied Kingdoms is a text adventure in which you choose your path from dozens of possible ways. In every scene, you read about what happened to your character and choose where to go from there. Every choice you make can lead to fortune or disgrace in search for answers about the strange blue rune that marks your left hand. It is a game for people who like to read and are curious enough to discover the continent of Harui and its many secrets.
